sentences.sContent: Her family was back in Oregon.
sentences.sCn: 她的家人都在俄勒冈州。

sentences.sContent: The other pictures were of Oregon, where Nick and Mary Ann had moved from four years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: The other pictures were of Oregon, where Nick and Mary Ann had moved from four years ago.
sentences.sCn: 其他照片是尼克和玛丽安在俄勒冈州照的，他们四年前才从那里搬过来。

sentences.sContent: Oregon conducts its elections entirely by mail, but it is the only state to do so at present.
sentences.sContent_eng: Oregon conducts its elections entirely by mail, but it is the only state to do so at present.
sentences.sCn: 俄勒冈州完全通过邮寄方式进行选举投票，但它是目前唯一这样做的州。
